title: Slowwwww what happen it use to be good
text: What the heck is going on? It take long to to send a command , freezes, absolutely waist of app . I might sell this crap on eBay and move to something better like nest .

title: Refresh
text:
Compared to the previous version this update though more pleasing to the eye is slow and takes forever to refresh...also when it comes to sending commands to the thermostat for some unknown reason in this update you reversed the send/cancel buttons - these type of things drive seniors absolutely batty...

Absolutely horrible latency problems compared to the last version...your update has all but rendered this app useless...sitting around testing an update with your own constituency - is not a valid field test...

How horrible is this update?  I’m removing my thermostat - selling it on eBay getting something with something with a more reliable app...

title: Keeps crushing
text: The app keeps logging your off and when you’re trying to login first starts flickering and then crushes and closes. I really don’t know if the developer receives the crush details and, if they do, why this is still an issue. As a developer myself, I know there’s no issues one cannot solve. It’s just a matter of priorities. I guess the company priority is just to sell you the thermostat that turns into a regular/dumb/old fashioned one as the smart features are not accessible due to the app malfunctions. When an average app rating is this low, it tells a lot about the company.

title: Good App but No Global Connection
text: Although you can control your thermostat through their website from any location. This app needs to be on same wifi as home to be connected to thermostat. Which is working on home but very disappointing that you can not control your thermostat from your office or out of town if you need to. Other than app works fine.

title: Unable to turn schedule off using iOS 12.4
text: With the latest version there’s no way to turn off the schedule as there was before under “Configure”.  The wide button says “Disabled due to schedule” and doesn’t do anything.  Please bring back this ability.

title: Unreliable and Out of Date
text: Works fine, then stops for no apparent reason. Same version forever with no updates. I need a reliable app because I have problems with stairs. When it works, it can actually save money as it makes it easier to turn AC/heating on and off, but ONLY when it works. I’m on the verge of replacing the thermostat with another brand.

title: Terrible experiance
text: Needed to reset my password for unknown reason. Once reset got message of “Success” but no access to the app to change my thermostat,, 45 minutes later 4 more ‘success’ ful login layer needed to reset my password again, finally got in..... terrible experience, 1 hour of my life wasted!

title: Update is worse
text: I am not happy with this update it’s slower than the previous version and constantly requires me to login again. The old version was better and trouble free.

title: Quit. No updates in 2years
text: I liked it when it worked. But iOS changes are killing it and there are no updates.

title: Won’t connect
text: Great when it worked. Will not connect reliably. Very disappointed.

title: Great app and I can send messages
text: This app has easy to use screens that allows me to control and monitor my thermostat at home remotely.  The first screen gives me temperature up/down and on/off control functions.  The second screen gives me the alerts, HVAC unit runtimes for heating-cooling modes and also allows me to send text messages to the front screen of the thermostat.  I have sent "Stop touching the thermostat buttons!" from my work to the front screen on the stat at home to get my kids to leave the thermostat alone.  Works great!!

title: Stopped working
text: It worked great up until the recent IOS update. Now it's no longer connecting.
